content.text: Taylor Lautner was born in Grand Rapids, Michigan and grew up in Hudsonville, Michigan.

content.sourceTitle: 10 Famous Virgins We Wouldn't Kick Outta Bed
content.text: and seems rather devout actually. Allegedly, there is an interview where he preaches the virtues of abstinence.

content.text: Plus, he's reportedly drug and alcohol-free.

content.sourceTitle: What is Taylor Lautner's political Affiliation
content.text: Lautner hasn't taken a political stand as of yet. But given his religiosity and the resulting positions on sex and drugs, it's reasonable to assume he's probably a conservative. But the various question and answer sites on the internet seem to agree that Lautner considers himself a Democrat.
